junit.framework
Interface SelectionTestListener

All Superinterfaces:
junit.framework.TestListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
SelectionResultPrinter, UniverseFileGenerator
public interface SelectionTestListener
extends junit.framework.TestListener

Interface extension which indicates that a test listener provides mechanisms to impose a numeric ordering on tests.
